subject: Fw: Thank you for your recent application, we are accepting your application
body:
Your credit score does not matter to us!
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE pocket money to spend ANY way you like, or simply want to LOWER your entire payment by a third or more, here is our best deal we can offer you NOW (hurry, this tender will expire TONIGHT):
$252,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest payments!
Hurry, when the deal is gone, it is gone. Simply finish this short form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit history will not disqualify you!
http://skelansyards.com/
